name: Taming of the shrew (Motion Picture: 1908)
description: 1 videodisc (11 min.) : sd., black & white ; 4 3/4 in. Notes:  Originally released by American Mutoscope and Biograph, 1908. Released by Kino International as a supplement to their Othello (c1922). Cast list provided by Internet movie data base, 10 July 2003. DVD; Dolby digital stereo. Silent film with English intertitles.
